WorkItem.Description:
I am trying to calculate CUMIPMT using PHPExcel and I seem to be getting different output from MS Excel and PHPExcel

In MS Excel if I enter the following formula =CUMIPMT(0.015,31.57,2000,1,31.57,0) the output I get is -524.94
where as while using PHPExcel the output for same values I get is -515.60

here is my PHP code

```
require_once 'Classes/PHPExcel/Calculation/Financial.php';
$interest_paid = PHPExcel_Calculation_Financial::CUMIPMT('0.015','31.57','2000','1','31.57','0');
```
WorkItem.Summary: PHPExcel CUMIPMT is giving different output than Excel CUMIPMT function
